Title: SpaceAPI for OS X
Description: A SpaceAPI status client for the OS X status bar.
Author: Andreas Pfohl

Title: Space API Statistics
Description: You see a timeline of the status for each hackerspace and at what time the hackerspace is most propably open..
Author: Sebastian Mai

Title: Hackerspace Globe
Description: On a 3D globe the sticks represent hackerspace locations while the color shows if it's open.
Author: Joe Walnes

Title: Hackerspace Wall
Description: Be up-to-date with the hackerspace wall. Check the tweet per hour meter, monitor the tweets and observe the space states - all in one page ...
Techniques: Node.js, Express, CoffeeScript, Jade, Less, MongoDB
Author: Trevor Power

Title: Hacker's OpenSpace
Description: Not only on websites but also natively in firefox with the Hacker's OpenSpace add-on will the space state be shown as a red or green dot. This add-on is compatible with firefox 5 to 16.
Author: Romain Schmitz

Title: My Hackerspace
Description: Check the space state everywhere with the My Hackerspace android app. Select your space and start monitor it.
Author: Aubort Jean-Baptiste

Title: OpenSpaceLint
Description: OpenSpaceLint is the Space API validator which tells you what's wrong with your implementation. The validator can be extended by plugins. Beside the validator OpenSpaceLint also provided the directory. In May 2013 OpenSpaceLint has been decoupled and is now integrated with the website as an app.
Author: Romain Schmitz

Title: Gnome Shell Extension
Description: No X? No smartphone? No problem with the Gnome Shell Extension!
Author: Gerard Ryan
